content.content: 1. A declaratory order under section 4 or 5 of the Act may contain a recital in Form 1. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 72, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. A declaratory order under section 4 or 5 of the Act may contain a recital in Form 1. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 72, s. 1.

content.content: 2. (1) A statutory declaration affirming parentage under subsection 12 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 2. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 72, s. 2 (1). (2) A joint statutory declaration affirming parentage under subsection 12 (2) of the Act shall be in Form 3. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 72, s. 2 (2).
content.raw_html:
2. (1) A statutory declaration affirming parentage under subsection 12 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 2. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 72, s. 2 (1).

(2) A joint statutory declaration affirming parentage under subsection 12 (2) of the Act shall be in Form 3. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 72, s. 2 (2).

content.content: 3. A finding of parentage in an order or judgment that is to be referred to in a statement furnished under section 14 of the Act may be in Form 4. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 72, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. A finding of parentage in an order or judgment that is to be referred to in a statement furnished under section 14 of the Act may be in Form 4. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 72, s. 3.

content.content: 4. A statement furnished under section 14 of the Act respecting an order or judgment that confirms or makes a finding of parentage shall be in Form 5. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 72, s. 4. FORM 1   RECITAL FOR ORDER UNDER SECTION 4 OR 5 OF THE ACT Children’s Law Reform Act  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 72, Form 1. FORM 2   DECLARATION AFFIRMING PARENTAGE Children’s Law Reform Act   R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 72, Form 2. FORM 3   JOINT DECLARATION AFFIRMING PARENTAGE Children’s Law Reform Act   R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 72, Form 3. FORM 4   FINDING OF PARENTAGE Children’s Law Reform Act   R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 72, Form 4. FORM 5   STATEMENT OF FINDING OF PARENTAGE Children’s Law Reform Act  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 72, Form 5. Français
content.raw_html:
4. A statement furnished under section 14 of the Act respecting an order or judgment that confirms or makes a finding of parentage shall be in Form 5. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 72, s. 4.
